subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees scouted Garza in 2005, but they passed on him with the 17th pick. The Minnesota Twins took Garza eight picks later, and now he is 11-8 for the Rays.
snippet: The Yankees scouted Garza in 2005, but they passed on him with the 17th pick. The Minnesota Twins took Garza eight picks later, and now he is 11-8 for the Rays.
